// Wilderflight with Low Blast Radius
//notes:jacobi (PvE): A base reload time of 2.82 seconds is very punishing. At that point, you better be landing your shots. Compared to every other tube launcher, the blast radius is abysmal and even speccing all the way into it will still leave you under the others base blast radius. For that reason, Spike Grenade and Blinding Grenade are pretty much the only perks you should be looking for. Avoid speccing into blast radius and velocity in the first column perks as they're either going to hurt more than they help or help so little they're basically useless.|tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=2306182339&perks=3798852852,2822142346,3523296417,11612903,758092021
